nodes.title: Make sure primeBackend snapshot listener doesn't fail.
Use orphaned docs as part of GC calculation
Allow passing POJOs as field values throughout API.
Migrated new APK size tool to OSS repository
Trying to fix issue #72 - Targeting Android 28, with Android Studio 3.2.1
LocalStore uses a SparseArray to track target ids, not a set
Add migration to add sequence numbers to documents
Small cleanup from lru port to webclient
Firebase App Test Rule module to avoid vendoring
Add dependency on empty version of listenablefuture.
Mikelehen/prime backend merged with revert proxy
Add priming logic to integration tests to avoid backend cold start issues.

Splitting into pre and post proguard tests

Schema migration that drops held write acks
Don't leak orphaned docs when deleting

b/80200799: Automatically log warnings for errors that likely represent developer mistakes / oversights.
Allow initial call to .getReference() from any thread
Add INTERNET and ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE to database permissions.
Adds Continuous Integration scripts to the repo.

Add @RunWith annotations to support non-gradle builds.

bump firestore version so that we can release the right version

Changing error message for missing google-services from DEBUG to WARN

Defer SharedPrefs read until it is needed.
Limit the number of events loaded per batch.
Modularize dagger to improve future testability.
Expose CG queries and add changelog.
use extra parenthesis so that errorprone doesnt complain
